snippet: KRANJAC--Dr. Thomas. January 29, 1949, died April 30, 2016. He was beloved husband of Paulette, father to Dane, uncle to John (Adriana), Richard (Cindy) and Elizabeth. Donations: romemu.org 1/3
lead_paragraph: KRANJAC--Dr. Thomas. January 29, 1949, died April 30, 2016. He was beloved husband of Paulette, father to Dane, uncle to John (Adriana), Richard (Cindy) and Elizabeth. Donations: romemu.org 1/3
